sections.title: Description
sections.raw_content: Returns true if a character is waiting to be read from the net stream specified by the netStream parameter. If Net.CharAvailable returns true, then a single character can be read from the stream without blocking.
sections.text_content: Returns true if a character is waiting to be read from the net stream specified by the netStream parameter. If Net.CharAvailable returns true, then a single character can be read from the stream without blocking.
sections.mdown_content: Returns **true** if a character is waiting to be read from the net stream specified by the _netStream_ parameter. If **Net.CharAvailable** returns **true**, then a single character can be read from the stream without blocking.

sections.title: Details
sections.raw_content:
The Net module requires a TCP/IP stack to be installed and operating in order to function. It does not communicate using any other protocols

It is possible for Firewalls to interfere with the actions of the Net module, preventing connections from taking place.
sections.text_content:
The Net module requires a TCP/IP stack to be installed and operating in order to function. It does not communicate using any other protocols
It is possible for Firewalls to interfere with the actions of the Net module, preventing connections from taking place.
sections.mdown_content:
The **Net** module requires a TCP/IP stack to be installed and operating in order to function. It does not communicate using any other protocols

It is possible for Firewalls to interfere with the actions of the **Net** module, preventing connections from taking place.

sections.title: Example
code:
if Net.CharAvailable (netStream) then
            var ch : char
            get : netStream, ch
            put ch ..
        end if
sections.raw_content: The following program fragment reads a character from netStream only if there is one waiting to be read.
sections.text_content: The following program fragment reads a character from netStream only if there is one waiting to be read.
sections.mdown_content: The following program fragment reads a character from _netStream_ only if there is one waiting to be read.

sections.title: Status
sections.raw_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling Net.CharAvailable, not by calling CharAvailable.
sections.text_content:
Exported qualified.
This means that you can only call the function by calling Net.CharAvailable, not by calling CharAvailable.
sections.mdown_content:
Exported qualified.

This means that you can only call the function by calling **Net.CharAvailable**, not by calling **CharAvailable**.
